# AI-related images

Various Runpod VM images, deployment scripts and instructions.

- Install docker as per https://docs.docker.com/engine/install/ubuntu/
- Signup to docker and Generate Token and login as per https://docs.docker.com/security/access-tokens/
- Optionally place docker images [cache on another drive](https://www.google.com/search?q=docker+mover+images+cache+to+another+directory&sca_esv=d77fcc26cc85d161&sxsrf=AE3TifN8N1wek7K12lj-AinjNHj6jlFW2g%3A1754168128047&ei=QHuOaMbUAo6KptQPndybyAU&oq=docker+mover+images+cache+to+&gs_&sclient=gws-wiz-serp)
- `sudo docker login --username dakoreff`

# Components
- [Comfy](./comfy/README.md)
- [Kohya_ss](./kohya/README.md)
